Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.godCards

Class YourBuildGodCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.godCards.GodCard
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.godCards.YourBuildGodCard
public class YourBuildGodCard
extends GodCard
Specific Card associated to a god whom effect activates during his turn. This kind of god implements his own build depending on three different parameters read from the json file.

  • Method Details

    • askBuild

      public boolean askBuild​(int i_src, int j_src, int i_dst, int j_dst, boolean buildDome)
      This override of askBuild considers extraConditions of the gods which can build a second time in a different or same space or not in the perimeter. Considers also cards that can build a dome everywhere and a block under themselves.
      Overrides:
      askBuild in class GodCard
      Parameters:
      buildDome - true if the builder wants to build a dome
      Returns:
      True if the builder can build at (i_dst, j_dst)

    • build

      public boolean build​(int i_src, int j_src, int i_dst, int j_dst, boolean buildDome)
      This override of build saves the firstBuildDst to do the necessary checks if there's a possible second build
      Overrides:
      build in class GodCard
      buildDome - specifies whether you want to build a dome or not
      Returns:
      True if it was successful (used for test purpose)
